title: At Home
description: Improve your French speaking skills with phrases commonly used at home. Focus on clear pronunciation and familial intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of common phrases you might use at home in French.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain a natural and clear speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and fluency.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.

items.question: Éteignez la télévision, s'il vous plaît.
items.answer: Éteignez la télévision, s'il vous plaît.

items.question: Il est temps d'aller au lit.
items.answer: Il est temps d'aller au lit.
